categories: Category:Battles of the Early rebellion against the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Armed rebellion in the Atrivis sector

In 5 BBY, an armed rebellion in the Atrivis sector was fought by the Liberators in the Atrivis sector, who managed to seize the Imperial Mantooine garrison. Shortly afterward, the Imperial Navy counterattacked, swiftly defeating the Liberators on Mantooine. The Atrivis Resistance Group was also active, and after due deliberation, soon joined the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
